key_risks: Environmental impact from energy-intensive data centers and physical storage facilities

social_issues: Customer complaints about deceptive billing, hidden fees, and poor customer service
Impact of customer service challenges on brand reputation and retention
governance_issues: Legal and regulatory compliance risks in a highly regulated industry
Need for improved governance around customer service and billing practices
